database.name: VIEW EEI_INVOICE_LOGS_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS eei_invoice_logs_v_id, il.ad_org_id, il.ad_client_id, il.isactive, il.created, il.createdby, il.updated, il.updatedby, ao.name AS organizationame, dt.em_eei_edoc_type AS doctypecode, CASE WHEN dt.em_eei_edoc_type = '01' THEN 'Factura de Ventas' WHEN dt.em_eei_edoc_type = '04' THEN 'Nota de Crédito' WHEN dt.em_eei_edoc_type = '05' THEN 'Nota de Débito' WHEN dt.em_eei_edoc_type = '06' THEN 'Guía de Remisión' WHEN dt.em_eei_edoc_type = '07' THEN 'Retención en Compras' ELSE NULL END AS doctype, ci.documentno, cp.name AS bpartner, ci.dateinvoiced, ci.em_eei_codigo AS accesskey, il.description FROM eei_invoicelog il JOIN c_invoice ci ON il.c_invoice_id = ci.c_invoice_id JOIN c_doctype dt ON ci.c_doctype_id = dt.c_doctype_id LEFT JOIN ad_org ao ON ao.ad_org_id = ci.ad_org_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner cp ON ci.c_bpartner_id = cp.c_bpartner_id ORDER BY il.created DESC
